title: Hooray, a Street Fighter 6 demo just dropped! Oh wait, PC gamers can't play it until next week
description: The demo is more singleplayer-focused than last year's betas.

title: If Diablo 4's not your thing, Men of War 2 is having an open beta on the same weekend
description: The World War 2 RTS playtest will feature three singleplayer missions.

title: Twitter finally purges blue checks from formerly 'verified' accounts, including many game studios and developers
description: The likes of Final Fantasy 16, Tim Schafer, Warframe, and others have been de-checked. Oh, and the Pope.

title: This computer interface you wear like a mustache will let you open doors and play games with your lips
description: The makers of LipIO are hoping to unlock a new level of accessibility.

description: Blasphemous 2 will be out later this year.

title: The Division Heartland is a spinoff that mixes extraction shooter with survival elements in small town America
description: Ubisoft showcased the new addition to The Division in a "developer deep dive" video.

title: [Deep breath] Tom Clancy's The Division 2 Warlords of New York Expansion Year 5 Season 1 Broken Wings Descent Mode will be on public test servers tomorrow
description: The free roguelike mode will let 1-4 PC players test their combat skills and experiment with new builds on the public test server on April 21.

title: Blizzard asks Diablo 4 fans to 'come slam our servers' in May 😏
description: Surprise: You'll be able to earn previous beta rewards and new ones during the "Server Slam."

title: Unrecord dev posts noclip video to prove the realistic bodycam FPS isn't 'fake'
description: The nearly photorealistic bodycam effect led some to question whether Unrecord was legit, so the developer turned on noclip.

title: Dark and Darker may be the punk hero of PC gaming this year
description: It's been kicked off Steam and released an official torrent all to "win back the hearts of gamers."

title: Worst boss ever? Tech CEO applauds employee for selling family dog for the good of the company
description: Clearlink CEO decides he no longer cares about being reasonable or sensible, challenges employees to "outwork" him in an unhinged rant.

title: The voice of Claptrap becomes the voice of Pisstrap in Postal 2's surprisingly big 20th Anniversary Update
description: The major update includes a new game mode, difficulty, weapon, and a big new addition to the voice cast.

title: The most controversial PC games of all time
description: From trainwreck ports to moral panics to lootbox disasters.

title: 2022's best detective game is getting a new case this month
description: Mystery adventure The Case of the Golden Idol is teasing us with the promise of more murders to solve.

title: Sonic may have just taken the crown for the coolest-ever Lego set
description: Oh to be a blue hedgehog Hot Wheels-ing around a plastic brick course.

title: PC Gamer Chat Log Episode 8: The quest to become the ultimate cozy gamers
description: Mollie and Lauren discuss the cozy gaming trend that's blown up on social media and their own love for all games warm and cuddly.

description: Erryn Rhoden didn't mean to enter the Candy Crush All Stars tournament, but she's become an esports icon.

title: If these benchmarks are true, the ROG Ally's graphics are gonna slap
description: AMD's newest mobile  graphics are looking pretty tasty.

title: Seagate agrees to pay US gov $300m for selling Huawei some hard drives
description: Seagate holds it did nothing wrong, but would rather give the gov $15m/quarter for the next five years than fight the case.

title: G.Skill KM250 RGB
description: The best budget gaming keyboard, and one with more than just a nod to the enthusiast keeb community.

description: Diablo fans are huffing all the hopium right now.
